1. "As an ACCA trainee, I conducted an internal audit of a client's purchasing department by reviewing purchase orders, conducting employee interviews and analyzing evidence to form an opinion on internal controls. I demonstrated professional scepticism by questioning unusual transactions and basing judgements on valid evidence."
2. "I performed an external audit of a client's financial statements by reviewing records, performing test of controls and forming an opinion on fair presentation of financial statements. I demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging management's assumptions and basing judgements on sufficient valid evidence."
3. "I conducted an assurance engagement for a client's IT system by reviewing policies, performing walkthroughs and testing controls. I formed an opinion on the effectiveness of IT controls and demonstrated professional scepticism by challenging existing controls and basing judgements on valid evidence."
